title: Large pothole on Main St near Park
description: Large pothole forming, dangerous for two-wheelers and cars. Needs immediate attention.

location.address: Main Street near Central Park, Bangalore

title: Water leak on 5th Avenue
description: Continuous water leak from underground pipe. Water is pooling on the street.

title: Broken streetlight on Oak Street
description: Streetlight has been out for 3 days. Area is very dark at night, safety concern.

title: Garbage pile near community center
description: Large pile of garbage accumulating near the community center. Smell and health hazard.

title: Traffic signal not working
description: Traffic signal at the intersection is completely out. Creating traffic chaos.

location.address: Intersection of Main St and Park Ave, Bangalore

title: Fallen tree branch blocking road
description: Large tree branch fell during last night's storm. Blocking half the road.
